name: Hidden Objects - The Room - My Wallet - The Big House game
name_original: Hidden Objects - The Room - My Wallet - The Big House game
description:
Play Free Games on:
http://www.myarcadegames.net

This wonderful hidden object game gives you the unique opportunity to find amazing hidden items with beautiful scenes.

3 in 1 Pack:
- The Room Objects
- The Wallet Objects
- The House Objects

Features
- Beautiful high-quality images
- Addictive Hidden Object gameplay
- Catchy sound effects and music!
- Differences randomized on each play
- 3 modes of hints if you get stuck
- Try to score the Highest score!
- No ADS!
